name: Fizik R1 Infinito Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: Top of the range in Fizik's road line, the R1 Infinito brings class-leading comfort and unmatched power transfer. The upper uses minimal seaming and stitching and blends breathability, flexibility and support. With a footbed that offers dynamic arch support, and a intuitive volume control system, the whole upper supports your foot’s profile for powerful, high intensity riding. The unidirectional carbon fiber outsole is light, stiff and ventilated for unmatched cooling and air exchange.Supple Microtex synthetic leather upper is a mere 1.2mm thick and laser-perforated for maximum breathability.Doubled Infinito IP-1 closure system for a custom fit and on the fly adjustments.Unidirectional carbon outsole transfers power to your pedals and is ventilated for cooling.
